Engineer

Hi, I'm Aditya Rai

As a highly skilled software engineer with expertise in web development using MERN stack and a strong background in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA), I am confident in my ability to design and implement scalable and efficient solutions to complex problems. With a passion for problem-solving, I am committed to delivering high-quality code and continuously improving my skills to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends.

What do I offer?

My approach to website design is to create a website that strengthens your company's brand while ensuring ease of use and simplicity for your audience.

UX / UI Design

"I'm a UI/UX designer with Figma expertise and a course in UI/UX design. I've designed prototypes for multiple websites and high-fidelity designs. I focus on creating intuitive and engaging user experiences that enhance digital products."

Web development

"I have experience in MERN stack web development, using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. I am proficient in both front-end and back-end development, and have a strong understanding of RESTful API design, database architecture, and web application security."
